mean_cn: v. 放大（声音等）；扩大；增强；详述；进一步阐述
mean_en: to make (something, such as a musical instrument) louder by increasing the strength of electric signals
word_etyma: ampl(e)大的 + ify动词后缀：使 → amplify 放大，扩大
short_phrase: amplify your voice with a megaphone
sentence: You can amplify your voice with a megaphone.
sentence_trans: 你可以用扩音器来放大声音。
